price: ពួកគេខ្សឹបខ្សៀវគ្នាថាៈ ពួកអ្នកមិនបានស្នាក់នៅ(ក្នុង លោកិយនេះ)ឡើយ លើកលែងតែចំនួនដប់ថ្ងៃប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
